text: Francisco Javier Benet Martín (born 25 March 1968 in Tétouan, Morocco) is a Spanish decathlete. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1990 |Ibero-American Championships |Manaus, Brazil |4thGuest out of competition |Decathlon |7073 pts |- |1992 |Olympic Games |Barcelona, Spain |22nd |Decathlon |7484 pts |- |rowspan=2|1994 |European Indoor Championships |Paris, France |10th |Heptathlon |5501 pts |- |European Championships |Helsinki, Finland |12th |Decathlon |7836 pts |- |1996 |Olympic Games |Atlanta, United States |align="center" | 19th |Decathlon |8107 pts |- |1997 |World Championships |Athens, Greece |align="center" | 15th |Decathlon |7929 pts |- |1998 |European Indoor Championships |Valencia, Spain |align="center" | 8th |Heptathlon |6044 pts |- |1999 |World Championships |Seville, Spain |align="center" | 16th |Decathlon |7529 pts |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish decathletes Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Spain Category:People from Tétouan
title: Francisco Javier Benet
